mapper.insert: insert into tb_order_person (order_id, person_name, person_phone, person_idno, person_address) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIdno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
